name: Slump!
description:
This little slime from outer space is just having a relaxing day jumping and having some fun!

Help the slime to jump in the correct color platform and get the higher score. You can even share it on Twitter!

Credits:

  • Delunado: Programming / Design.
  • Raquel Blanco: Art.
  • Paco Diago: Music & SFX.
